website_summaries.verdict: The Alcatel Idol 4S is a sleek Windows phone packed with powerful hardware, productivity features, and virtual reality capabilities. It's a great choice for T-Mobile users who can overlook the relatively limited app selection.
pros: Fingerprint sensor, dual-band Wi-Fi, and expandable storage
cons: Windows Mobile still lacks many major apps

customer_reviews.title: Alcatel Idol 4 - essentially same phone as Blackberry DTEK50 but with intrusive apps and potential security risk
customer_reviews.text: The Actatel Idol 4 contains intrusive apps and software over which it is very difficult to exert any control. The relative cheapness of this phone is offset by the potential security risk in intrusive apps, screens that suddenly popup for no apparent reason and are apparently designed so that in trying to close them there is a high risk of activating further apps. Whether this a co-incidence I don't know, but several weeks after buying this phone I had an ongoing problem with premium rate texts confirming I had signed up to gaming software without me actually knowing signed up. I am getting rid of this phone for no other reason than the reasons given in this review.
